Title: Requires the workers' compensation board to provide notice to covered employers before a fine is assessed for failure to obtain having workers' compensation coverage
Summary: Requires the workers' compensation board to provide notice to covered employers before a fine is assessed for failure to obtain having workers' compensation coverage.
LawCode: Amd ยง151, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to requiring the workers' compensation board to provide notice to covered employers before a fine is assessed for failure to obtain workers' compensation coverage
